data.title: Made In Japan
data.meta_description: "Made In Japan" is a song by Giancarlo Pasquini, released under the alias Dave Rodgers. It is an English-language self-cover of the 1996 single "MADE IN JAPAN" by the Japanese boy band V6, which was originally composed by Pasquini and Jennifer Batten. data.text:
"Made In Japan" is a song by Giancarlo Pasquini, released under the alias Dave Rodgers. It is an English-language self-cover of the 1996 single "MADE IN JAPAN" by the Japanese boy band V6, which was originally composed by Pasquini and Jennifer Batten. Rodgers' self-cover of the song was initially released on his fourth studio album, Take Me Higher (1997), and later released as the AA-side on a 12-inch promotional single along with another self-cover by Rodgers, "Take Me Higher", which served as the A-side and was released by Avex Trax in 1997. The song was produced by Rodgers, and the English language lyric translation was done by Fausto Guio.

The song was later covered by Pasquini in 2020 under the same alias.

Lyrics[]

[Verse 1]

Are you ready now

Wanna see your eyes in the sky

Can you show me now

Every kind of love got inside

[Pre-Chorus]

Don't go baby

Follow me and dance it

Friday night, every night

Come on baby

Show me you're dancin' till the night

Just tonight

[Chorus: Repeat Twice]

Made in Japan

Made in Japan

And I will give it to you

Made in Japan

Made in Japan

You gotta fly to the sky

[Verse 2]

Come to me right now

Hold my body body tight in the night

Try and show me how

All the love we're feelin' is right

Featured on[]

Year Version Album Track No. 1997 Made In Japan [Extended] Take Me Higher Track 9 Made In Japan [Mixed] The Best Of Non-Stop Super Eurobeat 1997 Disc 2, Track 5 2003 Super Euro Best Presents 70min. 70songs Track 48 2004 Super Eurobeat Vol. 150 - Anniversary Golden Hits Special Mega-Mix Disc 1, Track 11 2008 Made In Japan (English V.) [Extended Version] Super Eurobeat Presents Dave Rodgers Special Collection Vol. 1 Track 6 2011 Made In Japan [Mixed] Super Eurobeat Vol. 220 - Anniversary Hits Disc 1, Track 31 2016 Super Eurobeat Vol. 240 - Anniversary Hits 100 Tracks Disc 1, Track 32 2019 USA ~Buzz Japan Mix~ Track 2

Credits and Personnel[]

Credits and personnel adapted from 12-inch promotional vinyl.

Giancarlo Pasquini - songwriting, lead vocals (uncredited)

Jennifer Batten - songwriting, all guitars

Fausto Guio - english lyrics

Dave Rodgers - producing

Track Listing and Format[]

AVJT-2370 - 12-inch promo single

A. "Take Me Higher"

AA. "Made In Japan"

Dave Rodgers Cover (2020)[]
